mapper.insert: insert into products (id, c_id, title, product_no, keywords, cover_url, sale_price, cost_price, is_hot, is_stick, sort, status, desc, create_time, create_name, update_time, update_name) values (#{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{cId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{title,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{productNo,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{keywords,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{coverUrl,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{salePrice,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{costPrice,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{isHot,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{isStick,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{sort,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{status,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{desc,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{createTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{createName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{updateTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{updateName,jdbcType=VARCHAR})
mapper.update: update products set c_id = #{cId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, title = #{title,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, product_no = #{productNo,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, keywords = #{keywords,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, cover_url = #{coverUrl,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, sale_price = #{salePrice,jdbcType=INTEGER}, cost_price = #{costPrice,jdbcType=INTEGER}, is_hot = #{isHot,jdbcType=INTEGER}, is_stick = #{isStick,jdbcType=INTEGER}, sort = #{sort,jdbcType=INTEGER}, status = #{status,jdbcType=INTEGER}, desc = #{desc,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, create_time = #{createTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, create_name = #{createName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, update_time = #{updateTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, update_name = #{updateName,jdbcType=VARCHAR} where id = #{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}
mapper.select: select id, c_id, title, product_no, keywords, cover_url, sale_price, cost_price, is_hot, is_stick, sort, status, desc, create_time, create_name, update_time, update_name from products where id = #{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}
